lrc.lyric:
[by:IM花花]
[00:00.00]Gotta raise a little hell

[00:40.33]Don't care what your old man say
[00:43.35]Young blood, heaven hate a sinner
[00:46.10]But we gonna raise hell anyway
[00:48.76]Raise hell
[00:52.49]Yeah
[00:54.69]Raise hell

[01:02.61]Baby drop them bones
